posts.post_title: WTB: Any Hal Chase cards i don't have!
posts.post_content:
My Chase cards can be found here: [url]http://www.flickr.com/photos/calvindog/sets/72157607705122913/[/url]

I think I may have P2 large letter Chase pin.  Is that one that would interest you?
